title: Chappelle & Trans Activism, Katie Herzog
description:
Controversies over the topic of trans seem to come around on a weekly basis. The latest is around the recent comedy special by Dave Chappelle on Netflix. In the UK there was a big scandal over a concerted attempt to cancel the academic Kathleen Stock at her university, and a groundbreaking new podcast series from the BBC about the activist organisation Stonewall.

Katie Herzog is the co-host of the podcast Blocked and Reported which "scours the internet for its craziest, silliest, most sociopathic content, part of an obsessive and ill-conceived attempt to extract kernels of meaning and humanity from a landscape of endless raging dumpster fires."

Check out Katie's podcast Blocked & Reported: https://www.blockedandreported.org/

Check out Rebel Wisdom memberships here: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
